attributes.action: SCOTLAND SPECIAL NEEDS CHILDREN DESERVE RIGHT TO LEARN AS WOULD A ENGLISH CHILD
attributes.additional_details:
The government should join forces with Scotland to improve education in deprived areas like Clackmannanshire.
- Schools need the same tools and skills as those in Bromley Kent to succeed.
- My son's education has suffered since moving to Scotland.
- EHCPs are not valued in Scotland, which is failing children's education.
This system in england bromley encourages pupils who attend special education schools full-time This old-fashioned system, which didn't work in the 1990s,england is still here
attributes.background: Why isn't there a good enough education system in Scotland to support specific education needs, such as ADHD and behavior issues? I feel like, coming from Orpington in Kent, they have an amazing system and enough space to accommodate full-day education.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
